channel.title: Windows Genuine
channel.description:
Is anyone here having the "Windows conterfeiting" problem where you have that annoying genuine thing alway's pop-up on start up.
Is there anyone on these forums who can tell me how to get rid of it by not reinstalling the OS each time I get hit by some virus that would be fixed by an update...
Thank you.

item.title: Windows Genuine
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

weaselforce:

worked for me so far frankly I trust them more than microsoft.

True. I get that, but you never know. I’ve had spyware on my old computer, which actually installed Windows Updates (or appeared to install them) but actually it was installing more spyware lol. Then I got spybot, deleted the spyware, there was still on my comp, then I got another windowsupdate from that little icon on the bottom right.

Installed it, and bam some more spyware lol. Had to get my computer really cleaned by using 3 or 4 diff spyware cleaners. Sooooo you never know. If these guys were a corporation of some sort and were doing this legit without any catch, then I would trust them (90%).

Read full topic
